Instruction: In a medium bowl, combine the diced strawberries, diced red bell pepper, diced red onion, minced jalapeno pepper, and chopped cilantro.
Add lime juice and salt to the bowl, then gently toss all the ingredients until well combined.
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate the salsa for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
Serve the strawberry salsa chilled as a delicious side dish or topping for grilled fish or chicken.
